articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Juventus coach Pirlo completes coaching qualifications with near-perfect score - Goal
articles.description: German amateur side SG Ripdorf/Molzen II paid the price for watching their health as they went down 37-0 due to their fears of contracting coronavirus.

articles.title: Coronavirus vaccine update: Serum Institute of India and Novavax join hands to produce two billion doses of COVID vaccine - Times of India
articles.description: Serum Institute of India will also focus on producing the antigen component of the potential vaccine of Novavax, which is being called NVX-CoV2373.
